title: Buying skins
body: I currently do not have access to a computer to log into game, an I was wondering if there was any way to buy skins for your account while offline. I really want to purchase some of the new skins like star guardian jinx an little devil teem before they are removed or become legacy. I am currently in the process of getting a new pc however I worry it will be to late to get the skins.

replies.body: If you have RP on your account already, we can look into this for you!  I can't make any guarantees but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for our billing team to look out.  Hopefully we can help out!
